title: JSON schema for Outblocks App configuration files

name.description: Name of the app. Defaults to directory name.

env.description: Environment variables common for all operations.

dir.description: Working directory of the app where all commands will be run. Defaults to location of this yaml. All other dirs will be relative to this one.

path_redirect.description: Path redirect rewrites URL to specified path. URL path from 'url' field will be stripped and replaced with value below.

run.description: Run config used for dev builds during run.

remove_trailing_slash.description: Remove trailing slash with permanent redirect. Currently used only for deployments. Defaults to 'true' when gatsby routing is used, 'false' otherwise.

basic_auth.description: Static application basic authentication config. Currently used only for deployments.

build.description: Static application build config used for deployment builds.

private.description: Marks app as private - won't allow unauthenticated access.

build.description: Service application build config used for deployment builds.

container.description: Service application container config used for docker based deployments/runs.

private.description: Marks app as private - won't allow unauthenticated access.

runtime.description: The runtime in which the function is going to run, refer to cloud provider docs for possible options.

entrypoint.description: Name of the function that will be executed when the function is triggered. Not all deployment plugins support it. Defaults to application name.

build.description: Function application build config used for deployment builds.

plugin.description: Run plugin override. Defaults to first supported plugin available.

command.description: Command to be run to for dev mode.

port.description: Port override, by default just assigns next port starting from listen-port.

env.description: Additional environment variables available local run.

plugin.description: Deploy plugin override. Defaults to first supported plugin available.

min_scale.description: Minimum scale of container deployment (used if deployment uses a container).

max_scale.description: Maximum scale of container deployment (used if deployment uses a container).

timeout.description: Execution timeout. Execution is considered failed and can be terminated if the function is not completed at the end of the timeout period.

patterns.description: File/dir patterns to exclude (or force include if starts with '!').

plugin.description: Deploy plugin override. Defaults to first supported plugin available.

cpu_limit.description: CPU limit of container deployment. 1.0 means 1 full core of CPU will be used.

memory_limit.description: Memory limit in MiB of container deployment.

timeout.description: Execution timeout. Execution is considered failed and can be terminated if the function is not completed at the end of the timeout period.

container.description: Service application container config used for docker based deployments.

cron.description: Scheduler cron, e.g. */30 * * * * runs every 30 minutes.

name.description: Name of cron (just for information purpose).

method.description: HTTP method to use. Defaults to 'GET'.

path.description: Path to call in current app url.

headers.description: Additional headers to use for this call.

plugin.description: Deploy plugin override. Defaults to first supported plugin available.

memory_limit.description: Memory limit in MiB of function deployment.

min_scale.description: Minimum scale of container deployment (used if deployment uses a container).

max_scale.description: Maximum scale of container deployment (used if deployment uses a container).

timeout.description: Execution timeout. Execution is considered failed and can be terminated if the function is not completed at the end of the timeout period.

patterns.description: Package patterns to exclude (or force include if starts with '!').

realm.description: Basic auth realm name, defaults to 'restricted'.

users.description: Basic auth users in form of `user: password` where password is either in plain text or in a form of apr1 hash (used by htpasswd).

env.description: Additional environment variables available during build.

command.description: Command to be run to generate output files.

dir.description: Output dir to where static files end up.

image.description: Docker image to use. If specified, will try to pull this image if skip-build is enabled.

skip_build.description: Skip this image build phase. If enabled, requires image to be either present on docker host or custom image to be possible to pull.

skip_pull.description: Skip this image dependencies pull phase. As a result, doesn't check for newer versions of tagged dependencies. Useful if dependencies do not exist outside of local docker.

context.description: Docker context directory, relative to application dir.

dockerfile.description: Dockerfile to use, relative to context path. Defaults to 'Dockerfile'.

env.description: Additional environment variables available during build.

command.description: Command to be run to generate output files.

dir.description: Output dir to where built files end up.
